      • getFileSize

        public static long getFileSize(java.lang.String path)
        Get give path file total size. If path is a directory, it will compute total file size.
        参数:
        path - Get size path.
        返回:
        Path total size.

      • deleteFolder

        public static boolean deleteFolder(java.lang.String path)
        Delete folder. If give path is a file, it will delete a single file, if is a directory it will delete all file and child directory in this directory.
        参数:
        path - Folder path.
        返回:
        True delete success, otherwise false.

      • checkFileDirExisted

        public static boolean checkFileDirExisted(java.lang.String fileName)
        Check give parent directory of file path whether existed. If not existed will try to create it.
        参数:
        fileName - Check file path name.
        返回:
        True means parent directory existed or create success, other false.

      • compare2Sec

        public static boolean compare2Sec(long time1,
                                  long time2,
                                  int dur)

      • convertSizeUnit

        public static java.lang.String convertSizeUnit(long size)
        Convert app size unit from byte to "xx MB" or "xx GB" string.
        参数:
        size - Size in byte.
        返回:
        Formated string.

      • getMemoryAvailable

        public static long getMemoryAvailable(android.content.Context context)
        gaowenzhao add 2016.02.20 获取当前可用内存，返回数据以字节为单位。
        参数:
        context - 可传入应用程序上下文。
        返回:
        当前可用内存单位为B。
